MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY20 postcode area of Pennal affecting a number of properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30pm in order to carry out repair work in safety on the overhead line network , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:36am on the 24th March 2021.
